name: A large granite shield surrounded by darkness
data: It increases the users strength somewhat.
It increases the users constitution a good amount.
It has excellent armour class for its type (feeble in general).
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users acid resistance somewhat.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'parry'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'dodge'.
This shield is empowered with raging energies.
